Ralph Hernandez
===============

[City Council Members](https://www.snydertx.gov/Directory.aspx?DID=18)  
Title: Council Member - District One
  
[Email Ralph Hernandez](mailto:rhernandez@snydertx.gov)

  
  

Two-year term expiring in 2026.
